channel.title: First Ever PK!
channel.description:
As long as I've played Runescape I've never went player killing. Went for the first time today and got in one fight, BANG 27-20 DDS'd the dude. I didn't even have vengeance and I was using straight up welfare gear XD (Scim, Climbing Boots, Legend's Cape, etc...) Although I panicked pretty hard when looting and someone else attacked me, almost died. Adrenaline is pumping, about to clear the wilderness.
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/293fs40.png[/img]

item.title: First Ever PK!
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

naseem142:

gratz man, must havr felt exciting for your first pk heh , i honestly don’t ever pk. As you said, i’d just panic after killing aomebody and die lol.

Thanks. Very exhilarating, I still suck at it. Although I’ve never died PK’ing…

ox random xi:

the hell are those star things

Karambwan, used for combo eating with sharks and brews.

Read full topic
